title: Stock of letters found dumped near Pinwatta beach
content: The Pinwatta Police this afternoon (11) found a stock of important letters to be distributed by the Panadura Head Post Office near a hedge bush near the beach at Shanthi Mawatha, Pinwatta. Police found 99 important documents, including notices regarding jewelry mortgages, notices about exams and bank details, various bills and personal letters. The stock of letters was first seen by a former member of the Pradeshiya Sabha. After informing the Pinwatta Police, a team of police including OIC Suranga Ranaweera seized the letters found near the hedge bush. The area was searched for more letters and two officers from the Panadura Post Office were called to the police station.
